name: Canonical Intervention & Evidence Taxonomy
purpose: Standardize labels and structure used by agent-created deliverables across runtime/outputs.

axes.name: Intervention type
axes.description: High-level class of intervention being evaluated.

categories.name: Choice architecture (nudge)
categories.description: Alters how options are presented without changing economic incentives or restricting choice.

categories.name: Information/communication
categories.description: Provides information, reminders, warnings, or education without changing the option set.

categories.name: Incentives
categories.description: Changes monetary or non-monetary payoffs or rewards.

categories.name: Rules/restrictions
categories.description: Mandates, bans, eligibility rules, or friction that limits or conditions choices.

categories.name: Service delivery/process
categories.description: Changes operational process, staffing, workflows, channels, or access.

categories.name: Technology/product
categories.description: Uses or modifies tools, software, interfaces, or products affecting behavior.

categories.name: Multi-component
categories.description: Bundles two or more distinct intervention types.

categories.name: Other
categories.description: Does not fit predefined categories.

categories.name: Unknown
categories.description: Insufficient information to classify.

axes.name: Nudge mechanism
axes.description: Mechanism(s) for choice-architecture interventions; can be used as a general behavioral mechanism tag set.

categories.name: Defaults
categories.description: Pre-selects an option unless the decision-maker opts out.

categories.name: Friction/effort
categories.description: Increases or decreases effort required to choose an option (e.g., one-click vs multi-step).

categories.name: Salience/attention
categories.description: Changes prominence or visibility of information/options.

categories.name: Framing
categories.description: Changes wording/presentation to alter interpretation without changing facts.

categories.name: Ordering/placement
categories.description: Reorders or repositions options (e.g., menu placement).

categories.name: Simplification
categories.description: Reduces complexity, cognitive load, or required calculations.

categories.name: Commitment devices
categories.description: Enables pre-commitment, pledges, or constraints chosen by the participant.

categories.name: Social norms
categories.description: Communicates what others do/approve to influence behavior.

categories.name: Feedback
categories.description: Provides performance/outcome feedback (often personalized).

categories.name: Timing/prompts
categories.description: Delivers prompts at decision-relevant moments (e.g., reminders).

categories.name: Personalization
categories.description: Tailors content or options to user attributes or context.

categories.name: Other
categories.description: Does not fit predefined mechanisms.

categories.name: Unknown
categories.description: Insufficient information to classify.

axes.name: Study design
axes.description: Primary evaluation design used to estimate impact.

categories.name: Randomized controlled trial (individual)
categories.description: Randomization at the individual/household level.

categories.name: Randomized controlled trial (cluster)
categories.description: Randomization at group/site level (e.g., schools, clinics).

categories.name: Difference-in-differences
categories.description: Uses pre/post with a comparison group and parallel trends assumption.

categories.name: Regression discontinuity
categories.description: Uses assignment cutoff to estimate local causal effect.

categories.name: Instrumental variables
categories.description: Uses instrument to identify causal effect under exclusion restrictions.

categories.name: Matching/synthetic control
categories.description: Constructs counterfactual by matching or weighted combination.

categories.name: Before-after (no control)
categories.description: Pre/post without a control group (descriptive/weak causal).

categories.name: Cross-sectional
categories.description: Single-time observational association.

categories.name: Qualitative
categories.description: Interviews, focus groups, ethnography, or thematic analysis.

categories.name: Simulation/model
categories.description: Analytic or computational model rather than empirical evaluation.

categories.name: Other
categories.description: Does not fit predefined designs.

categories.name: Unknown
categories.description: Insufficient information to classify.

axes.name: Population
axes.description: Primary participant group targeted or studied.

categories.name: General public
categories.description: Broad population without specific occupational role.

categories.name: Consumers/users
categories.description: People making consumption or product/service choices.

categories.name: Employees/workers
categories.description: Workplace populations.

categories.name: Students
categories.description: K-12 or higher education students.

categories.name: Patients
categories.description: Healthcare recipients.

categories.name: Providers
categories.description: Clinicians, teachers, caseworkers, or other service providers.

categories.name: Organizations
categories.description: Firms, schools, hospitals, agencies as units.

categories.name: Policy administrators
categories.description: Officials implementing/operating programs.

categories.name: Other
categories.description: Does not fit predefined populations.

categories.name: Unknown
categories.description: Insufficient information to classify.

categories.name: Health
categories.description: Clinical outcomes, adherence, prevention, wellbeing.

categories.name: Finance
categories.description: Savings, debt, payments, financial choices.

categories.name: Education
categories.description: Enrollment, attendance, learning, completion.

categories.name: Environment/energy
categories.description: Conservation, emissions, recycling, energy use.

categories.name: Civic/public sector
categories.description: Voting, compliance, service uptake, tax behavior.

categories.name: Workplace/productivity
categories.description: Performance, safety, hiring, retention.

categories.name: Consumer behavior
categories.description: Purchasing, browsing, conversion, churn.

categories.name: Social outcomes
categories.description: Prosocial behavior, discrimination, cooperation.

categories.name: Other
categories.description: Does not fit predefined domains.

categories.name: Unknown
categories.description: Insufficient information to classify.

axes.name: Effect direction
axes.description: Direction of the main reported effect for the primary outcome (as stated by authors/analysts).

categories.name: Positive
categories.description: Moves outcome in intended beneficial direction.

categories.name: Null
categories.description: No meaningful/statistically supported effect.

categories.name: Negative
categories.description: Moves outcome in unintended harmful direction.

categories.name: Mixed
categories.description: Heterogeneous effects across outcomes/subgroups/time.

categories.name: Inconclusive
categories.description: Evidence insufficient or analysis underpowered/ambiguous.

categories.name: Unknown
categories.description: Not reported or cannot be determined.
